item.description:
I know it's last minute, but I'm hoping to get a class in this Saturday to make up for this past weekend!

Strip Fit: This class is enjoyable and leaves you feeling sexy and strong. It is slower paced then hip hop but works the body to the max. We'll start with a warm up that includes some belly dance, latin dance, and hip hop, then really break a sweat learning a fun and flirty chair routine. You will love this fun and empowering class that helps tone your legs, abs, and butt!

I'm hoping that Saturday works out for people, if so, I will be scheduling classes more regularly.
If this is your first time at Bridget's Dance Studio please arrive 15 minutes early to fill out waiver forms and get aquinted with the studio.

I'm also offering free child care this weekend if six or more people sign up to take the class. If you are planning on bringing your child (don't worry-blinds will be closed!), please let me know.

Thanks to everyone for your understanding when I had to cancel!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Strip Fit!!!
